publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1086.1 Dr Richard Simpson: Witnesses Expenses and Allowances-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1086) in the name of Robert Brown, in the line beginning "childcare costs, specially incurred", in column (2), leave out "£2.50 per hour" and insert "up to £5 per hour". Supported by: Elaine Smith*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mrs Margaret Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Elaine Thomson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Rhoda Grant*, Cathie Craigie*, Karen Whitefield*, Hugh Henry*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mike Watson*, Ms Margaret Curran*, Johann Lamont*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Jamieson*, Margaret Jamieson*, Scott Barrie*, Cathy Peattie*, Paul Martin*, Karen Gillon*, Pauline McNeill*, Janis Hughes*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Helen Eadie*
